source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SEQ_00<tab>Slipslix's head may be buried in a book, but it's clear from his manner that he's in dire need of a research assistant.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SEQ_00<tab>イディルシャイアのスリップスリクスは、何かに悩んでいるようだ。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SEQ_01Recent rumors surrounding the appearance of a flying monstrosity in the vicinity of Dun Scaith have been troubling Slipslix. You resolve to aid him by traveling to the floating island, that you might track down some concrete evidence of the being's existence. The goblin tasks you with procuring a piece of this strange entity, in hopes that it will bring him closer to revealing the truth behind its identity.

※Dun Scaith can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SEQ_01スリップスリクスによると、空賊たちが「影の国ダン・スカー」付近で妙な「バケモノ」を目撃したという噂が流れているらしい。「バケモノ」を探し出して一部を持ち帰ることで、その謎に近づくことができるかもしれない。「影の国ダン・スカー」を攻略しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SEQ_02<tab>Your journey bears fruit as you do battle with the airborne menace, obtaining a fragment of its armor. Slipslix will doubtless be eager to have a firsthand look at the spoils.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SEQ_02<tab>「影の国ダン・スカー」で遭遇した飛行生物から、装甲片の一部を入手した。イディルシャイアで待つ「スリップスリクス」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SEQ_03<tab>It becomes apparent that the creature sighted near Dun Scaith was a killing machine created long ago by the Allagan Empire. Slipslix theorizes that it mistook a mighty voidsent on the island for a primal, setting out to obliterate it. Slipslix presents you with a curious sheet of metal retrieved from the ancient weapon, inviting you to deliver it to his compatriot Slimthix and claim your well-deserved reward.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SEQ_03<tab>「影の国ダン・スカー」で遭遇した飛行生物は、古代アラグ帝国が造りし蛮神兵器だったようだ。なぜ蛮神兵器が「影の国ダン・スカー」に現れたのかについては、スリップスリクスの仮説によると、「影の国ダン・スカー」にひしめく妖異を、蛮神と誤認識したのではないかということだ。今回の報酬として譲り受けた、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2447101 /var>」をスリムシクスに渡すことで、おどろく逸品を作成してもらえるらしい。
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_TODO_00<tab>「影の国ダン・スカー」を攻略

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_TODO_01<tab>Give the Allagan weapon scrap to Slipslix.
target: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_TODO_01<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C6C01 /var>」をスリップスリクスに渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_001<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Slipslix has ear-catched much of uplander's adventures. Yes, skystealers are always trading tongueflaps about uplander when they come to make busydeals with Slipslix.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_001シュコォ……シュコォ……
ウワサに　聞いたゾ　オマエのハナシ！
お客の空賊　言ってたゾ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_002<tab>Slipslix has also ear-catched that uplander has been to floatyrock Dun Scaith. This is Slipslix's lucky day!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_002雲海果ての　「影の国ダン・スカー」
オマエ　行って帰ってきたと！
さすがは　腕利き冒険者　ゴブは関心　大満足！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_100_002<tab>Slipslix has also ear-catched that uplander is planstriking assault on floatyrock Dun Scaith. This is Slipslix's lucky day! Widehearted uplander would be happy to do hand-lending for Slipslix while uplander is there, yes?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_100_002雲海果ての　「影の国ダン・スカー」に
これから　オマエが　乗り込むと！
さすがは　腕利き冒険者　ゴブは関心　大満足！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_003<tab>Skystealers trade tongueflaps about giant miscreation seen near Dun Scaith. Gives gobbie the shiveryshakes!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_003それから　空賊　ハナシてた！
最近　「影の国ダン・スカー」　周辺空域
妙な「バケモノ」飛んでるらしい！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_004<tab>Flighty-beast, ancient giant of whirlycogs...addlebrained guessings spill from uplanders' braincases, but Slipslix would seek true knowings!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_004ソイツは竜か　古代の兵器か　結局まったく正体不明！
それでもゴブは　知りたいゾ　どうにか正体　突き止めたい！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_005<tab>Go to Dun Scaith and rip-take part of monster. Will not be easygoings, but uplander can bring back part to Slipslix, yes?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_005だから　オマエに　依頼をお願い！
「影の国ダン・スカー」　出かけて　「バケモノ」探し
ソイツの一部をはぎ取って　ゴブに届けてくれないか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_100_005<tab>Go to Dun Scaith and rip-take part of monster. Will not be easygoings, but uplander can bring back part to Slipslix, yes?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_100_005だから　オマエに　依頼をお願い！
「影の国ダン・スカー」　辿り着いたら　「バケモノ」探し
ソイツの一部をはぎ取って　ゴブに届けてくれないか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>The item Slipslix seeks can be obtained by completing the raid “Dun Scaith.”
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SYSTEM_000_006本クエストを受注している状態で、
「影の国ダン・スカー」を最後まで攻略すると、
クエストの進行に必要なアイテムを入手することが可能です。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_010<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Uplander is before Slipslix's eyes once more. Today too is Slipslix's lucky day!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_010シュコォ……シュコォ……
再び会ったな　スゴ腕冒険者！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_011<tab>Primal-blasting weapon piece gives gobbie heartthumps! But still need to rip-take more!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_011オマエがくれた　「蛮神兵器」一部　とても研究役立った！
でもでも　まだまだ　足りないの！
だから　オマエに　またお願い！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_012<tab>Backtrack to Dun Scaith and rip-take more pieces! Slipslix will give adventurer more sheets if adventurer does good sweatworking. Slipslix gives wordbond!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_012「影の国ダン・スカー」　出かけて　「蛮神兵器」探し！
ソイツの一部をはぎ取って　ゴブに届けてくれないか？
よろしく頼むな　スゴ腕冒険者！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_021<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Gobbie needs adventuring uplander. One strong enough to hand-lend with rumor research.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_021シュコォ……シュコォ……
気になるゾ　調べたいゾ　あのウワサ！
どこかにいないか　腕利き冒険者！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first prove your strength by unlocking the raid “Dun Scaith.”
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SYSTEM_000_022本クエストを受注するには、
レイドコンテンツ「影の国ダン・スカー」を、
開放する必要があります。

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_030<tab>Dawdling here won't give hand-lending to Slipslix's research! Go with fastness to Dun Scaith and rip-take creaturebits. Uplander is Slipslix's only hope!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_030オマエ　「影の国ダン・スカー」まで　ひとっ飛び！
「バケモノ」　やっつけ　一部をゴブまで　持ってこい！
オマエに頼んだ　大仕事！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_031<tab>Dawdling here won't give hand-lending to Slipslix's research! Go with fastness to floatyisle and rip-take more from giant of whirlycogs. Uplander is Slipslix's only hope!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_031またまた　「影の国ダン・スカー」まで　ひとっ飛び！
「蛮神兵器」　やっつけ　一部をゴブまで　持ってこい！
オマエに頼んだ　大仕事！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_049<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Did uplander find miscreation? Rip-took part for Slipslix, yes?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_049シュコォ……シュコォ……
「影の国ダン・スカー」の　「バケモノ」　見つけたか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_050<tab><var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is what uplander rip-took from giant floaty-thing in Dun Scaith? Good gobbies in heavens! Slipslix eyecatches same-looking object before!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_050こいつが　ウワサの「バケモノ」一部！？
こいつは　びっくり　驚いた！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_100_050<tab>This comes from Allagan primal-blasting whirlycog! But what is it doing on floatyrock Dun Scaith? Just thinking about it makes Slipslix's braincase painthrob.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_100_050もしかして　こいつは　アラグの　「蛮神兵器」！？
使われてる物質　よく似てるみたい！
でもでも　どうして　「影の国ダン・スカー」に？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_101_050<tab>Wait! Uplander saw many voidsent on floatyrock, yes? Maybe whirlycog mistakes voidsent for primal, and starts blasting?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_101_050そういや　あの一帯　妖異がたくさん！
強い妖異　蛮神と　勘違いしたか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_051<tab>Slipslix must research this theory, and research with fastness! Knowing truth may be uncovered gives Slipslix heartthumps and shiveryshakes!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_051さっそく　とにかく　調べてみるゾ！
研究　探索　大挑戦！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_052<tab>And do not think that Slipslix has forgotten wordbond! In return for hand-lending, Slipslix is happy to share shiny riches with uplander.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_052そうそう　オマエに　お礼もするゾ！
「蛮神兵器」一部　謎の金属　より分け　取り分け　お裾分け！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_053<tab>Take to Slimthix, and Slimthix will fancycraft treasure worthy of uplander's sweatwork! Slipslix hopes to count on uplander again!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_053スリムシクス　なかなか　どうして　スゴ腕職人！
コイツを渡せば　おどろく逸品　きっとバシっと　作ってくれる！
それじゃ　今回おつかれさん　またまた手伝い　よろしくな！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_100_060<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Has uplander brought primal-blasting whirlycog part for Slipslix?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_100_060シュコォ……シュコォ……
「影の国ダン・スカー」の　「蛮神兵器」一部　持ってきたか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_060<tab>Another scrap from primal-blasting whirlycog? No tongueflaps can express Slipslix's gratitude! Uplander's hand-lending will lead Slipslix to greater and greater knowings!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_060そうそう　これこれ　「蛮神兵器」一部！
これで　研究　はかどるゾ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_061<tab>Here it is! Take to Slimthix to get reward for good sweatworking!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNM303_01480_SLIPSLIX_000_061オマエの　お礼は　いつものやつな！
「蛮神兵器」から　取り分けた　謎の金属　お裾分け！
それじゃ　今回おつかれさん　またまた手伝い　よろしくな！
